import React, { useState } from 'react' const TaskCard = (props) => { const { title , body, id, handleUpdate, handleDelete, handleCheck, index, status} = props const [queryTitle, setQueryTitle] = useState(title) const [queryBody, setQueryBody] = useState(body) const [edit, setEdit] = useState(false) const [check, setCheck] = useState(status) return ( <> {!edit && (
{handleCheck(index, e.target.checked) setCheck(e.target.checked) }} />

{body}

)} { edit && (
{ setQueryTitle(e.target.value) }} > setQueryBody(e.target.value) } >
)} ) } export default TaskCard
